Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2008 07:59PM Jeanne08 wrote: Hi Lisa,  I just had my last fill of saline, and I was worried about how it would feel also- it doesn't hurt- it is just a tiny pinch, and most of the time I did not feel anything, but it is scary when you go in and see the huge syringe filled with saline. I had no idea how they put it in, I was sore a few days after- like I was about to burst any moment, then when you are finally finished with the saline, it stills feels weird and sore sleeping on your side, bending over, and doing any kind of upper movement.  I feel like I have learned so much, and now need some information on different kinds of implants.  Take care   Jeanne
Posts.Title: 3 days post bilat with recon twogirls twogirls
